snippet: Dozens of soldiers on each side have been killed and the countries are perilously close to open war.
abstract: Armenia and Azerbaijan clash with increasing ferocity over territory of Nagorno-Karabakh; dozens of soldiers on each side have been killed and countries are perilously close to open war.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of soldiers on each side have been killed and the countries are perilously close to open war.

headline.main: Clashes Intensify Between Armenia and Azerbaijan Over Disputed Land
headline.print_headline: Clashes Intensify Between Armenia and Azerbaijan Over Disputed Land
